casebody.data:
Charles S. Miller v. Frederick G. Reincke, Warden, Connecticut State Prison

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Cotter and Thim, Js.

Argued October 9 decided October 9, 1968 Arnold H. Klau, special public defender, for the appellant (plaintiff). Walter M. Pickett, Jr., assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed on the authority of Reed v. Reincke, 155 Conn. 591, 236 A.2d 909, and D’Amico v. Reincke, 155 Conn. 627, 236 A.2d 914.

There is no error.
